You may also contact us by other means below; utilize the map below for directions to Bradford Creek. We hope to see you soon! CONTACT US FORM First Name Last Name Email Phone Subject Message Submit CONTACT INFORMATION ADDRESS 4950 Old Pactolus Road Greenville, NC 27858 PHONE tel: 252.329.4653 FEEDBACK Comments & suggestions: Email feedback@indigogolf.com MEET THE TEAM JON MCLAWHORN, PGA General Manager Email Jon AARON REDD Superintendent Email Aaron GOLF IS CALLING YOUR NAME Our course features excellent Bentgrass greens that are considered some of the best in the Greenville region. Camp Creek Inn | Inlet Beach FL Hotels Instagram Tripadvisor Youtube Google Business facebook google_business skip to main content Subscribe Contact us Accommodations Standard Premium Pine Suite Offers Golf Camp Creek Golf Course Shark's Tooth The Third Golf Course Group Golf Packages Ship Sticks Dining ANR 1936 Bark ‘N Brine 30°86° Beach Break Grill Shark's Tooth Experience The Beach Club Tennis & Pickleball Wellness Amenities Sporting Clays Beach Bonfires Shopping Events Groups Meeting Space Group Golf Packages Group Racquets Packages Sports Packages Gallery Location About Us FAQ Contact Us Our Team In the News Booking Conditions Blog Join our Newsletter Accommodations Standard Premium Pine Suite Offers Golf Camp Creek Golf Course Shark's Tooth The Third Golf Course Group Golf Packages Ship Sticks Dining ANR 1936 Bark ‘N Brine 30°86° Beach Break Grill Shark's Tooth Experience The Beach Club Tennis & Pickleball Wellness Amenities Sporting Clays Beach Bonfires Shopping Events Groups Meeting Space Group Golf Packages Group Racquets Packages Sports Packages Gallery Location About Us FAQ Contact Us Our Team In the News Booking Conditions Blog Join our Newsletter Reservations: (877) 648-4144 Hotel Information : (877) 648-4144 Stay Social Book now Camp Creek Inn Discover Laid-Back Luxury Along 30A Discover More View 360 Tour Framed by tall pines and lush, emerald-green fairways, discover a hidden sanctuary in beautiful South Walton, Florida. Camp Creek Inn is a tranquil, charming, and intimate escape from the typical Florida beach towns—featuring an elevated yet comforting ambiance and touches of Louisiana-inspired architecture. Our 75-room boutique hotel along 30A exudes a feeling of laid-back luxury from the moment you arrive. Imagine your own unique escape filled with curated experiences only found at Camp Creek Inn. Find serenity at the Wellness Center or floating along the lazy river, gather around the fire pits as you take in the captivating views of Camp Creek Golf Course, or let relaxation overcome you under a deep blue canopy of sky at the private Beach Club just moments away. Camp Creek Inn Guest Experiences As a guest at Camp Creek Inn, you become a "Member for a Stay," enjoying privileges at private Watersound Club ® membership amenities. This one-of-a-kind destination includes access to an exclusive beach club, five expansive outdoor pools, state-of-the-art health and wellness facilities, and three 18-hole golf courses—Shark's Tooth, The Third, and Camp Creek ® Golf Course. Elevated dining venues, tennis, and pickleball round out the resort experience. View all experiences Beach Club Explore the Beach Club Private Golf Courses Explore Golf Tennis & Pickleball Explore Tennis & Pickleball Rooms & Suites Upscale accommodations View all rooms King Room Our Standard King Guest Room provides a comfortable yet luxurious experience for up to two guests. View Room Details Book Now Double Queen Room Suited for up to four people, our Standard Queen Guest Room offers a relaxing yet opulent experience. View Room Details Book Now King + Balcony With a large balcony overlooking the hotel grounds, our Standard King Guest Room with Balcony provides a comfortable and opulent experience for up to two visitors. View Room Details Book Now Double Queen + Balcony Our Standard Queen Guest Room with Balcony offers a luxurious and cozy experience for up to four guests with a spacious balcony overlooking the hotel grounds. View Room Details Book Now ADA King + Balcony With a large balcony overlooking the hotel grounds, our ADA Accessible King Guest Room with Balcony guarantees an enjoyable and luxurious stay for up to two people. View Room Details Book Now ADA Double Queen For up to four visitors, our ADA Queen Guest Room provides a comfortable and opulent setting overlooking Camp Creek Golf Course. View Room Details Book Now Junior Golf Suite Our Junior Golf Suite provides a comfortable yet luxurious experience for up to two guests. The Junior Golf Suite features a King-size bed, loveseat, and spacious bathroom. View Room Details Book Now Pine Suite Our Pine Suite provides a luxurious experience for two guests with more privacy and additional space. The Pine Suite features a private bedroom with a King-size bed, chair, and spacious bathroom. View Room Details Book Now Golf View King + Balcony The elegant and inviting Golf View King Guest Room with Balcony accommodates up to two guests and features a large balcony with views of Camp Creek Golf Course. View Room Details Book Now Golf View 2 Queen + Balcony Our Golf View Queen Guest Room with Balcony offers a luxurious and cozy experience for up to four guests with a spacious balcony overlooking Camp Creek Golf Course. View Room Details Book Now Driving Range View King + Balcony Our Driving Range View King Guest Room with Balcony offers a luxurious and cozy experience for up to two guests with a spacious balcony overlooking the Camp Creek Golf Course practice facility. View Room Details Book Now Golf View King Our Golf View King Guest Room provides a comfortable yet opulent experience for up to two guests with a view of Camp Creek Golf Course. View Room Details Book Now Golf View Double Queen With a view of Camp Creek Golf Course, our Golf View Queen Guest Room provides an elegant and inviting experience for up to two adults and 2 children. View Room Details Book Now Driving Range View 2 Queen + Balcony The Driving Range View Queen Room with Balcony offers guests stunning views of the Camp Creek Golf Course practice facility from a spacious furnished balcony. View Room Details Book Now Exclusive Offers Book your coastal getaway and save View all offers PlayMore by Preferred Golf Experience the ultimate golf getaway with the PlayMore Offer by Preferred Golf package at Camp Creek Inn. View Offer Details Book Now One Ocean Film Tour Package Book Early. Save More. Experience It All. Plan your fall escape now and secure your stay for the One Ocean Film Tour happening Saturday, November 22, 2025 at Camp Creek Inn. View Offer Details Book Now Mountainfilm Festival Package November 7 & 8, 2025 Elevate your Mountainfilm Festival experience with Camp Creek Inn's luxurious rooms, exclusive amenities, and 2 tickets to this iconic outdoor event. View Offer Details Book Now Stay More, Save More Up to 25% Savings Enjoy up to 25% OFF standard rates when you Stay More. View Offer Details Book Now Preferred Suites Suite Savings at Camp Creek Inn Save 30% on your suite stay when you book two or more nights View Offer Details Book Now Advanced Purchase Offer 25% Off Standard Rates 25% OFF standard rates when your reservation is made at least 30 days in advance. View Offer Details Book Now Preferred Bed & Breakfast Enjoy Daily Breakfast for Two Start your morning off right at Camp Creek Inn. View Offer Details Book Now Tennis Package World-Class Tennis Facilities Experience the ultimate tennis getaway at Camp Creek Inn! View Offer Details Book Now Pickleball Package World-Class Pickleball Facilities Enjoy America's fastest-growing sport at Camp Creek Inn. View Offer Details Book Now Military Appreciation Service members save up to 20% at Camp Creek Inn. View Offer Details Book Now Florida Resident Offer Up to 20% Savings Florida residents receive up to 20% off standard rates. View Offer Details Book Now AAA/AARP Special discounted rate for AAA or AARP members. View Offer Details Book Now Dining Camp Creek Inn offers a diverse and inviting dining experience, ensuring there's a restaurant for every taste and occasion. View Restaurants Blog Step into the world of the Camp Creek Inn Blog, where we invite you to explore the latest updates, insider tips, and captivating stories that unfold within our luxury coastal getaway in South Walton, Florida. Read blog Gallery Browse our image gallery to learn more about the Camp Creek Inn experience. View Gallery Located in Northwest Florida The stunning scenic Highway 30A area of Northwest Florida boasts charming coastal towns like Inlet Beach, Rosemary Beach, Alys Beach, and Seaside. Steps from the pristine white sands of Florida's gulf coast, Camp Creek Inn provides an ideal setting for family vacations, wellness retreats, romantic getaways, or group golf outings. Explore Area Arrival Departure Rooms & Guests Adults field is required 1 Room - 1 Adults , 0 Children Rooms 1 Adults 1 Children 0 Book now Contact Us Club Membership Terms of use Privacy + Cookie Policy Accessibility St. Joe Experiences Back to top Contact Us Club Membership Terms of use Privacy + Cookie Policy Accessibility St. Joe Experiences Camp Creek Inn 684 Fazio Dr, Inlet Beach, FL 32461 Reservations: (877) 648-4144 Hotel Information: (877) 648-4144 Sign up for Exclusive Offers Join Us Book Now
